data.subject: 122. 寫C++程式碼說明傳參考呼叫call by reference。
data.content:
int main()
{
    vector <int> vec{1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8};
    cout << "call by value:    ";
    for(auto i:vec)
        i++;
    for(auto i:vec)
        cout << i << " ";

    cout << "\ncall by reference:";
    for(auto&i:vec) // call by reference
        i++;
    for(auto i:vec)
        cout << i << " ";

}

call by value:       1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8
call by reference:2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9

只有call by reference才會真正改變呼叫變數的值
